author: COMSOL
description: This example considers the design of an ion implantation system. A key design requirement for the system is that the number density of outgassed molecules is low along the path of the ion beam. In this example the number density is computed along part of the ion beam path as an out-gassing target wafer is rotated about its axis within the system.
label: ion_implanter.mph
